ch0244_90_hop/0101_0701_01_10:
Yo, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Nice to see
you again!
ch0244_90_hop/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s add another page to the tale of
Pasio’s legend!
ch0244_90_hop/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ll be the go-to guy people can talk to about
anything battle related!
ch0244_90_hop/7101_0701_03_10:
If there’s anything you don’t understand, bring
your questions to me!
ch0244_90_hop/7102_0701_01_10:
When you’re working hard to be the best,
sometimes you can get lost or trip up. But I
guess that’s necessary.
ch0244_90_hop/7102_0701_02_10:
Each time you climb over a new obstacle, it makes
you feel like you’re growing, one inch at a time.
ch0244_90_hop/7102_0701_03_10:
It fires me up to think Lee and Sonia used to be
like that, too!
ch0244_90_hop/7103_0701_01_10:
It doesn’t matter who the opponent is. My Zapdos
isn’t afraid to charge into a challenge!
ch0244_90_hop/7103_0701_02_10: I’ve learned a lot with that approach!
ch0244_90_hop/7103_0701_03_10:
For example, I’ve learned to never do things
halfheartedly. I’ve gotta give it all I’ve got!
ch0244_90_hop/7104_0701_01_10:
Professor Kukui is so cool! He’s not just
knowledgeable about Pokémon. He’s good at
battling, too!
ch0244_90_hop/7104_0701_02_10:
I wanna be an exemplary Pokémon Professor
like him!
ch0244_90_hop/7104_0701_03_10: I guess I should start with...working out?
ch0244_90_hop/7105_0701_01_10:
You and I may be on different paths,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0244_90_hop/7105_0701_02_10:
But there have gotta be a lot of ways we can
help each other out!
ch0244_90_hop/7105_0701_03_10:
True strength is being able to lend a hand when
someone’s in trouble...
ch0244_90_hop/1701_0701_01_10: I’ve got something I wanted to give you.
ch0244_90_hop/1701_0702_01_10:
Knowing your way around items is crucial if you
wanna get stronger!
ch0244_90_hop/2501_0701_01_10:
Hehe, this costume makes me look like Lee,
doesn’t it?
ch0244_90_hop/2501_0701_02_10:
It doesn’t mean I’m the Galar Champion, but it
feels great to wear!
ch0244_90_hop/2501_0702_01_10:
It’d be nice if the marks of support on the back
kept increasing, just like on Lee’s cape!
ch0244_90_hop/2501_0702_02_10:
Can’t be the strongest Champion without that
weight on your shoulders, right?
ch0244_90_hop/2511_0701_01_10:
When I’m studying, Sonia regularly checks in
on me...
ch0244_90_hop/2511_0701_02_10:
A lot of people, like Professor Oak, are watching
over me.
ch0244_90_hop/2511_0701_03_10:
For me, I’ve always got my hands full just taking
care of my own things.
ch0244_90_hop/2511_0701_04_10:
But for them, they’re able to take care of us
younger Trainers, too! It’s so cool.
ch0244_90_hop/2511_0702_01_10:
If I ever become someone’s mentor, I’d like to
support them as much as I can!
ch0244_90_hop/2511_0702_02_10: It’ll be my turn to teach all the things I’ve learned!
ch0244_90_hop/3001_0701_01_10:
A new day, a new beginning to my legend!
I’m gonna train hard, as usual!
ch0244_90_hop/3003_0701_01_10:
My daily routine is to battle until I’m tired, then
study, and when that gets boring, I battle again!
ch0244_90_hop/3005_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna think about Pokémon and battling
24-7—so I can become an invincible
Pokémon Professor!
